mkz.labyrinth3D.game.objects

Class ObjectRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mkz.labyrinth3D.game.objects.ObjectRenderer

  • public class ObjectRenderer
extends Object
    Obeject 3D renderer. Renders all registered objects. Handles object order for rendering (for alpha rendering).
    Author:
    Hans
